en.today: Your sense of stability could be challenged this morning, dear Aries, as the Aquarius moon squares Uranus. Take shocking news, chaotic events, and twists of fate in stride, especially when pieces of information are missing. It would be easy to lose composure while a harsh square between Mars and Chiron intensifies this afternoon, so be mindful to avoid hasty reactions. Now is also a good time to examine how specific actions are hurtful to yourself or loved ones. Slip away into your world once Luna enters Pisces, seeking privacy so you can reflect on present circumstances while building up to new dreams.

en.today: Don't be discouraged if loved ones seem distant this morning, darling Leo. A harsh square between the Aquarius moon and Uranus brings an unpredictable energy to the table, and walls may go up suddenly as people scramble to find their footing. Do some soul-searching this afternoon when Mars and Chiron align, examining what you need to feel nurtured, passionate, and on track. Spiritual support systems can be helpful during this time, marking the perfect occasion to meditate, pray, or draw tarot cards. You'll sense change brewing from deep within once Luna enters Pisces and your house of transformation.

en.today: The Aquarius moon and Uranus square off this morning, dear Taurus, sending shockwaves your way. Sudden obstacles or issues with authority figures may throw you in a loop, but try to stay grounded so impulses don't lead you astray. Unfortunately, it may be challenging to rehearse your words while Mars and Chiron square off, weakening your filter. If you notice physical symptoms of anger bubbling up, find a good reason to excuse yourself. Tensions begin to fade once Luna drifts into ethereal Pisces, washing away unresolved conflicts. Use this energy to promote community by offering olive branches or lending support.

en.today: The energy could feel uncertain yet exciting, darling Gemini, as the Aquarius moon and Uranus square off. Be observant and adventurous to make the most of these vibes, prepared to jump should the opportunity choose to knock. Connecting with your higher power will allow you to see what others cannot, so be sure to keep your third eye strong. Technological distractions threaten to lead you in the opposite direction while Mars and Chiron square off but try not to get sucked into screens when there is beauty right in front of you. Let your fantasies drift further into the future once Luna enters Pisces.

kh.today: ថាមពលនេះអាចមានអារម្មណ៍ថាមិនប្រាកដប្រជានៅឡើយទេគួរឱ្យរំភើបណាស់ដែលគួរឱ្យរំភើប, Gemini, ដូចជា Aquarius Moon និង Uranus Square បិទ។ត្រូវសង្កេតនិងផ្សងព្រេងដើម្បីធ្វើឱ្យមានភាពរស់រវើកទាំងនេះភាគច្រើនដែលបានរៀបចំលោតគួរតែឱកាសជ្រើសរើសដើម្បីគោះទ្វារ។ការភ្ជាប់ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយថាមពលខ្ពស់របស់អ្នកនឹងអនុញ្ញាតឱ្យអ្នកមើលឃើញអ្វីដែលអ្នកដទៃមិនអាចដូច្នេះត្រូវប្រាកដថារក្សាភ្នែកទីបីរបស់អ្នកឱ្យរឹងមាំ។ការរំខានខាងបច្ចេកវិទ្យាគំរាមនាំអ្នកក្នុងទិសដៅផ្ទុយខណៈពេលដែល Mars និង Chiron Square បិទប៉ុន្តែព្យាយាមមិនឱ្យស្រូបចូលក្នុងអេក្រង់នៅពេលដែលមានភាពស្រស់ស្អាតនៅចំពោះមុខអ្នក។សូមឱ្យការស្រមើស្រមៃរបស់អ្នករសាត់កាន់តែខ្លាំងឡើង ៗ នៅពេលដែល Luna ចូលក្នុង Pisces ។
